channel.title: Tutorial island for a 317 sever
channel.description: hi eveyone ive been looking.on the interet all day for a tutorial island tut but i carnt find one so could eneyone link me to one or put me in the right direction thanks

item.title: Tutorial island for a 317 sever
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“jd6655, post:11, topic:462884”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=566128.msg4174621#msg4174621 date=1354834992]

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/35888-fully-working-tutorial-island-repost.html

Enjoy.

That tutorial is so trash, like. I can’t even understand what the hell he was trying to accomplish.
I’ve seen about 10 posts on a 100% working tut island in here.
There’s none released. Go make you’re own.
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/configuration/397139-tutorial-island-dialogue-interfaces.html
^ That’s all the dialogues you need right there. And some misc. stuff… It was wrote for a 503 server, but you can steal bits and convert to 317.
[/quote]
you can’t even help and that is a teleport to the island all he needs to do is add npc’s thats it you can’t even read the post you post you could of atleast not agreed instead of a put down saying it’s trash…[/quote]
He doesn’t include enough information. The dialogues are custom, so that knocks it down from it being 100% tut island. I can guarantee his doors don’t work. Plus, why would you want to spoon feed the kid on how to add it. That teaches him absolutely nothing.
Edit: Plus, your tutorial you gave him is for some source no one uses anymore. So him trying to add it would result in errors out the ass. And he’d come back here to report all of them.

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial island for a 317 sever

Enjoy.[/quote]
That tutorial is so trash, like. I can’t even understand what the hell he was trying to accomplish.
I’ve seen about 10 posts on a 100% working tut island in here.
There’s none released. Go make you’re own.
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/configuration/397139-tutorial-island-dialogue-interfaces.html
^ That’s all the dialogues you need right there. And some misc. stuff… It was wrote for a 503 server, but you can steal bits and convert to 317.

item.title: Tutorial island for a 317 sever
item.dc:creator: @jd6655 jd6655
item.description:
@jd6655 wrote:

Hey sorry you are having troubles but here is how you can fix it

Go to your commands.java and add ok with that change Your server name to your server name and Your cords here to the coordinates of the place you wan them to teleport make sure you have a comma between them like this 2324,3464 not sure if there is a space but if you get error please reply LAST thing you need to know add npc’s to the place anything you want where you see

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“TutorialIsland”) {
You can change where it says Tutorial Island to what you want so in game if you change it it will be this ::TutorialIsland but until you change it if you want
if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“TutorialIsland”) {
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(“Welcome to Your Server name Tutorial Island.”);
Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(Cords for place here, 0));
return true;
}

Read full topic

What’s the point in adding an ‘advanced’ one if you’re not going to understand what it does. You might as well make a basic one that you understand and just build on it every time you learn something new
